alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Foothills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 04 at 9:10AM MST until January 04 at 12:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern, south central and southwestern South Dakota and northeast Wyoming. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation and the Rosebud Reservation. * WHEN...Until noon MST /1 PM CST/ today. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Motorists may encounter areas of frosty and slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your low-beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Northern Foothills; Northern Meade Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills
